items.title: FDA Approves Zongertinib for HER2-Mutated NSCLC
items.description: Approval followed priority review and was based on response rates and duration of response demonstrated in the phase 1b Beamion LUNG-1 trial. Medscape...

items.title: US Preventive Services Task Force: 5 Things to Know
items.description: If the 16 experts who make up the panel are replaced, will the work of the panel continue, and in what manner? Medscape Medical News

items.title: Mood Boost in Men Tied to Women’s Body Odor
items.description: A new study links ovulation body odor to a calming, positive shift in men’s emotional state. Medscape Medical News

items.title: Pediatricians Accuse Employer of Union Retaliation
items.description: An Ohio hospital system says two pediatricians were not fired for labor organizing but for inappropriately using an employee directory. The doctors ha...

items.title: Rare Eye Disease Gets First NHS Drug Recommendation
items.description: NICE’s recommendation of idebenone (Raxone) for Leber hereditary optic neuropathy offers hope for patients against visual impairment. Medscape News UK
